form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: APPLICATION FOR VERIFICATION OF INFORMATION FROM IMMIGRATION AND NATURALIZATION SERVICE RECORDS, FORM G-641 (REV. 5-5-83IN

full_text: U. 1056 OMB No. 1115-0088 UNITED STATES DEPARTMENT OF JUSTICE Expires 3-31-85 Immigration and Naturalization Service Fee Stamp APPLICATION FOR VERIFICATION OF INFORMATION FROM IMMIGRATION AND NATURALIZATION SERVICE 24MAR,1985 RECORDS TYPE OR PRINT THE NAME AND MAILING ADDRESS OF THE PERSONS TO WHOM INFORMATION OR COPIES OF RECORD SHOULD BE RETURNED IN THE BOX BELOW: 810604 RSON CONSENTING NAME AND ADDRESS NAME STREET ADDRESS FOIA (b)(6) FOIA (b)(6) CITY. STATE ZIP CODE U. S. DEPARTMENT OF JUSTICE IMMIGRIA TION & NATURALITATION SERVICE 300 NORTH LICIS ANGELES STRIET 1. CHECK TYPE VERIFICATION REQUESTED LOS ANGMENS, 20012 OF FOR WHICH DESIRED u-los b/Ak 3. NUMBER OF COPIES DESIRED. DATE ISSUED 18. ADDRESS WHEN CERTIFICATE WAS ISSUED 19. NAME AND LOCATION OF NATURALIZATION COURT OR IMMI- GRATION OFFICE ISSUING CERTIFICATE OF CITIZENSHIP 20 SIGNATURE OF APPLICANT DO NOT COMPLETE THIS BLOCK - RESERVED FOR GOVERNMENT USE ONLY FOIA (b)(6) THE RECORDS OF THE IMMIGRATION AND NATURALIZATION SERVICE REFLECT THE FOLLOWING: DATE VERIFICATION OF INFORMATION REQUESTED WAS MADE ON THISHDATE SHOWN AT RIGHT Rov 28, 1979 3/20/86.
